description: the variable context is referenced in the pci_manager.__init__(), but it's not passed in as an argument or defined anywhere. Thus exception will be thrown when it's referenced.
title: context referenced in pci_manager.__init__, but not defined

comments.content: the variable context is referenced in the pci_manager.__init__(), but it's not passed in as an argument or defined anywhere. Thus exception will be thrown when it's referenced.

comments.content:
Realistically the patch series makes this bug kind of invalid, because so much else has changed. 

In future for something as straight forward as clear syntax issue please just fix. Bugs of this type typically get very stale very quickly and end up being not very useful for actually tracking issues.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
